author: Erica Handel
title: 90 Day: The Single Life fans slam Natalie’s job interview skills - Dexerto
text:
Entertainment Reality TV 90 Day: The Single Life fans slam Natalie’s job interview skills Erica Handel ❘ Published: 2024-01-25T21:59:39 ❘ Updated: 2024-01-25T21:59:51 TLC
Natalie went on a job interview on 90 Day: The Single Life.
Natalie Mordovtseva went on her first job interview in America on 90 Day: The Single Life, but fans think her interview skills need work.
Natalie Mordovtseva is looking for a job on 90 Day: The Single Life , and her boyfriend Josh Weinstein’s cousin Adam interviewed her at the chiropractor’s office that he works at.
An exclusive clip from the upcoming episode of 90 Day: The Single Life posted by ET shows Natalie on the job interview , and she wasn’t prepared for it at all.
Article continues after ad People Natalie Mordovtseva goes on job interview on 90 Day: The Single Life. 90 Day Fiancé fans question Natalie’s intentions to work When Adam asked about her experience in customer service, she said, “I used to work in a bookstore, so I have experience selling books,” which didn’t relate to working with customers.
Article continues after ad Natalie then mentioned that she has experience answering phones, emails, and copywriting, but couldn’t explain what job she used those skills at.
In the comments of the video , 90 Day Fiancé fans criticized Natalie’s lack of effort at the job interview.
“I don’t think she really wants to work. I think she wants to be taken care of. That’s how she comes across,” one fan commented.
Sign up to Dexerto for free and receive: Fewer Ads | Dark Mode | Deals in Gaming, TV and Movies, and Tech Email Sign up Article continues after ad “Who goes to an interview without a CV already updated,” another fan agreed.
“She’s there for around 3 years and did not translate her CV yet?! So interested in having a job,” a third fan chimed in.
Article continues after ad Natalie expressed to Josh that she wants to build a life for herself in America, but fans feel that she hasn’t taken the steps to do so.
She relied on Josh to help her find her an apartment, and is doing the same thing when it comes to looking for a job.
Article continues after ad Natalie has lived in America for three years, and still doesn’t realize that she has to work hard to get what she wants.
90 Day: The Single Life airs Mondays at 8:00 p.m. ET on TLC.
Related Topics 90 day fiance About The Author Erica Handel Erica Handel is a Reality TV Writer at Dexerto. Her favorite reality shows are Below Deck, The Kardashians, Vanderpump Rules, Dancing with the Stars, and the Real Housewives franchise. She attended BravoCon and a taping of Watch What Happens Live and has even met a few Bravo stars in person.
